Summary: 6. Order Confirmation & Email Notification "As a customer, I want to receive a clear order confirmation page and email after completing checkout, so I can verify that my order was successfully placed and contains the correct details."
3.Search Bar "As a customer, I want to search for products by name , brand, or category so that I can easily find the products I’m interested in without browsing through all categories."

5.Cart & Checkout Process "As a customer, I want to add products to my cart, manage quantities, choose shipping and payment options, and confirm my order, so I can complete my purchase easily and securely."

4.Top Navigation Bar "As a customer, I want to use the top navigation bar to quickly access product categories and subcategories so that I can easily browse and find products without typing in the search bar."
US03: As an admin, I want to add new products to the catalog (including name, price, description, category, image, and quantity) so that customers can view and purchase them.
US02: As an admin, I want to filter dashboard data by date range (Today, This Week, This Month, Custom Range) so that I can analyze sales trends.
US01: As an admin, I want to view dashboard statistics (total sales, total orders, total customers, and top products) so that I can monitor store performance.
As an admin, I want to review quarantined comments marked as spam.
As an admin, I want to define spam sensitivity and banned keywords.
As an admin, I want to enable spam protection to block spam comments automatically.
As an admin, I want to filter comments by their related article or approval status.
As an admin, I want to modify or remove inappropriate comments.
As an admin, I want to view comments on articles and approve or reject them.
As an admin, I want to see view counts or engagement metrics.
As an admin, I want to set articles as “draft” or “published.”
As an admin, I want to set SEO title, meta description, and keywords.
As an admin, I want to link an article to one or more topics for better organization.
As an admin, I want to create and edit articles with content, images, categories, and tags.
As an admin, I want to enable or disable a topic’s visibility to publish or unpublish it.
As an admin, I want to view all topics in a list and search/filter them by name or sort order.
As an admin, I want to delete outdated topics so that the CMS remains clean.
As an admin, I want to edit an existing topic to update its content or correct mistakes.
As an admin, I want to create a new topic with a title, description, and SEO data so that it can be displayed on the website.

2.My Account (Profile, Order History, Logout)"As a registered customer, I want to access and manage my account information, view my order history, and log out securely, so I can keep my profile updated and track my purchases."
1.Login / Register / Forgot Password "As a customer, I want to log in, register, or recover my password so that I can securely access my account and complete purchases on the website."
As an Admin, I want to create and manage information pages so that customers can access important details (e.g., About Us, Privacy Policy).
As an Admin, I want to moderate customer reviews so that I can maintain quality and trustworthiness in product feedback.
As an Admin, I want to manage unique identifiers for products (like SKU, UPC, EAN) so that I can track items accurately in the inventory system.
As an Admin, I want to upload and manage downloadable files so that customers can access digital products after purchase.
As an Admin, I want to define product options (e.g., size, color) so that customers can choose variants during purchase.
As an Admin, I want to manage product attributes and attribute groups so that I can describe product specifications systematically.
As an Admin, I want to define and manage filters so that customers can narrow down product searches effectively on the storefront.
As an Admin, I want to create and manage subscription plans so that I can offer customers recurring purchases or memberships.
As an Admin, I want to add, edit, and manage products so that I can maintain an accurate and complete catalog for my customers.
As an Admin, I want to create, edit, and manage product categories so that I can organize products effectively within the catalog.
As an Admin, I want to view an overview of store performance (orders, sales, customers, and online users) so that I can monitor key business metrics in real time.
